data.name: Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean - Miko Costumes
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes a set of miko costumes which includes:
  • Miko Fox Face Mask
  • Miko Sleeves

To use this item, go to inventory machine in the centre of the 1st floor.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC includes a set of miko costumes which includes:
  • Miko Fox Face Mask
  • Miko Sleeves

To use this item, go to inventory machine in the centre of the 1st floor.
data.short_description: A set of player miko costume outfits for Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
